text:
Aww yeah, guys! So today we're 
learning English with Charlize Theron

in Fate of the Furious. And I'm 
super excited for today's lesson

because I have a wonderful new fluency coach 
joining me here. Cassé from South Africa.

And if you are new here, well every week we 
help you to understand fast English

without  getting lost, without missing the jokes, and without 
subtitles! So be sure to hit that subscribe button

and the button below so that you don't miss a 
single one of our new lessons.

We'll look at a scene with Charlize Theron and Vin 
Diesel, as well as interviews she did. Let's watch!

Do you want to be able to watch absolutely any 
movie or tv series in English without needing  subtitles?

If understanding the jokes, culture, 
and every word is important to you, our three-part

masterclass is just what you need to speak 
English more confidently and fluently.

You can try  it for free with our three-part masterclass. Just 
click up here or down in the description below.

If you love this lesson, then I recommend you watch 
this one next. Let's check out a clip from that.
